snippet: Tayshana Murphy, a high school basketball star, was shot dead in a hallway of the Grant Houses in 2011 after a shootout between young men from the neighboring Manhattanville Houses.
abstract: Drug dealer Brittany Santiago testifies at trial of Tyshawn Brockington in shooting death of high school basketball star Tayshana Murphy in Harlem in 2011; Santiago, who is testifying in part to avoid prosecution on drug dealing charges, says Murphy was drawn into continuing street fight between Brockington and Robert Cartagena, who is also charged with murder in the incident.
lead_paragraph: Tayshana Murphy, a high school basketball star, was shot dead in a hallway of the Grant Houses in 2011 after a shootout between young men from the neighboring Manhattanville Houses.

headline.seo: Shooting Victim Was on Wrong Side of Street Fight, Jurors Are Told
headline.main: Young Victim Was Drawn by Street Fight, Jury Is Told
headline.print_headline:
Jury Is Told of a Young Shooting Victim
Drawn In by a Continuing Street Fight
